name: Psychic Fragment
languages: can repeat one phrase it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The psychic fragment can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Mimicry
entries: The psychic fragment can mimic a single word or phrase it spoke in life. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 11} Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Withering Touch
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4 damage) necrotic damage.
